name: Demonscale Leggings
data: It increases the users strength an average amount.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It increases the users constitution noticably.
It decreases the users wisdom slightly.
It decreases the users intelligence slightly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat faster than average.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
